# wdrs_result_summary { #wadoh_subtyping.transform.wdrs_result_summary }

```python
transform.wdrs_result_summary(wdrs_res_col: str)
```

wdrs result summary

## Usage {.doc-section .doc-section-usage}

to be used in a .with_columns() statement

## Parameters {.doc-section .doc-section-parameters}

<code>[**wdrs_res_col**]{.parameter-name} [:]{.parameter-annotation-sep} [str]{.parameter-annotation}</code>

:   wdrs result column

## Examples {.doc-section .doc-section-examples}

```{python}
#| echo: false
{{< include "../_setup.qmd" >}}
```
```{python}
import wadoh_subtyping.transform as tf
from wadoh_raccoon.utils import helpers
import polars as pl

df = pl.DataFrame({
    "TestResult": [
        "Not Detected {52}",
        "Detected {51}",
        "Test {53}"
    ]
})

result = (
    df
    .with_columns(
        WDRS_RESULT_SUMMARY=tf.wdrs_result_summary(wdrs_res_col='TestResult')
    )
)

helpers.gt_style(df_inp=result)

```
